rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A spacious entrance that leads to the living area and kitchen. Designed with wide doors for ease of movement in accordance with Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: The main living space featuring large windows facing east to capture the morning sunlight as per Vastu guidelines. Mediterranean-style decor is used with natural stone and wood finishes.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room with access to the central courtyard for a seamless indoor-outdoor transition. Natural lighting enhances the ambiance.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen with Mediterranean accents, ergonomic design, and ample workspace. Positioned in the southeast to align with Vastu norms for prosperity.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A comfortable guest bedroom located on the ground floor for ease of access. Decor includes soft hues and traditional elements.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: Private library space with built-in shelves for books. The room is situated in a quiet corner to promote concentration and serenity.

openings.name: Front Door
openings.description: Main entrance door located on the southern side for auspicious entry.

openings.name: Back Door
openings.description: Secondary exit leading to a small deck area adjacent to the swimming pool.

openings.name: Pool Entrance
openings.description: Entrance from the living area to the outdoor swimming pool and adjoining courtyard. Designed for easy access while maintaining privacy.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: The master bedroom features a private balcony with Mediterranean views and is oriented to capture the morning sun as per Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Second Bedroom
rooms.description: Additional bedroom for family members or guest use. Incorporates modern fixtures while retaining traditional aesthetics.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Master bathroom adjacent to the master bedroom with adequate lighting and ventilation in accordance with local building norms.

openings.name: Staircase
openings.description: Staircase connecting ground floor and first floor located centrally for ease of access. Designed following safety standards and Vastu guidelines.

openings.name: Balcony Door
openings.description: Door leading to the master bedroom balcony overlooking the courtyard.
